title: If more than one urinal is provided, at least one urinal shall have a clear leveled space of not less than 0
clause_text: If more than one urinal is provided, at least one urinal shall have a clear leveled space of not less than 0.80 m wide x 1.5 m deep in front. A vertical grab rail near urinal. An emergency call bell shall be provided in an accessible WC cubicle.

source_pdf.text_snippet: If more than one urinal is provided, at least one urinal shall have a clear leveled space of not less than 0.80 m wide x 1.5 m deep in front. A vertical grab rail near urinal.
